body_html: It looks like all the architectures mentioned in that bug do support SSE3. Could we leave SSE3 on even as we turn off SSE4? It would be nice to have consistent denormal semantics, since it avoids truly horrific surprises for anyone for whom denormals matter.
body_text: It looks like all the architectures mentioned in that bug do support SSE3.  Could we leave SSE3 on even as we turn off SSE4?  It would be nice to have consistent denormal semantics, since it avoids truly horrific surprises for anyone for whom denormals matter.
